# minesweeper

simple minesweeper made with pyzero 

To setup: 
```
~ python3 -m venv venv
~ source venv/bin/activate
~ pip install pgzero, pygame, pygame-ce, pygame_gui
```

To run:
```
~ source venv/bin/activate
~ python3 main.py
```

on windows, it may be 
```
~ source venv/Scripts/activate
```
